FuncDef: The vpn-instance command configures a VPN instance for an address pool. The undo vpn-instance command deletes the configuration. By default, no VPN instance is configured for an address pool.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. The character string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").

ExtraInfo: This command applies to DHCP servers. To apply DHCP services in a VPN instance, you need to run the vpn-instance command to bind the created IP address pool to the VPN instance.
